subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: From afar, Yankee Stadium at night looks like the mother ship in “Close Encounters”: a stunning, spectral apparition rising out of the Bronx, lit up like a Christmas tree and seemingly floating over the streets in the dark.
snippet: From afar, Yankee Stadium at night looks like the mother ship in “Close Encounters”: a stunning, spectral apparition rising out of the Bronx, lit up like a Christmas tree and seemingly floating over the streets in the dark.
